resources.string: The Ghostery Ad Blocker is in beta at the moment. The final version will provide the following options: Allow Fair Ads (default setting), Block All Ads, Allow All Ads.\nMore https://cliqz.com/whycliqz/adblocking

Ghostery has blocked access to %1$s because it has been reported as a phishing website.\nPhishing websites disguise as other sites you may trust in order to trick you into disclosing your login, password or other sensitive information.\n[Learn more|https://cliqz.com/en/whycliqz/anti-phishing]
You are in control: Ghostery Anti-Tracking protects your privacy
Please note: Ghostery has to download some data packages first, before the ad-blocker works efficiently. For this, the app must be connected to Wi-Fi.
Get the best out of Ghostery
Open Ghostery Browser on your computer (or get it from ghostery.com).
Connect Ghostery on your mobile device with Cliqz on your computer. This will allow you to send links or download YouTube videos from your desktop straight to your smartphone or tablet.
Allow Ghostery Browser to access this device\'s location
